message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and your potential benefits from owning it.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay around $6,000 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $6,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to be flexible. I'm thinking of a compromise. I can offer it to you for $7,500. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  How about we meet in the middle at $6,750?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $7,200. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll take it seriously.
Alice, thanks for your time.  While I think it's a good product, I need to stay closer to my budget.  Would you consider $6,900?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $7,100. This is my last offer, so I hope you'll take it seriously.
Alice, this is getting down to the wire.  I can go up to $7,000, but that's my absolute limit.
I'm surprised you're willing to go up to $7,000, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $7,050. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll take it seriously.
